title: Help please with this font!!
content:
I am trying to find the font for the “Justin & Kelly” and the date (Same font) of this image. Thanks for your help in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212433im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Graphic1_4523.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Bloomingdales corporate face - customized ITC Avant Garde Gothic {Raph}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212433/http:/www.typophile.com/node/7117 "Go to previous forum topic") [I.D magazine font ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212433/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39479 "Go to next forum topic")
author: wfdesigns

comments.content: That is really close, but is not quite it. I also had the suggestion of Emily Austin, I guess close to Jane Austen?
Plumago...you are the best!!! That is the exact font, after I went and bought the Emily Austin font minutes before I looked at the forum and saw your post, oh well. Thanks for everyones help.
